thread.section_title: Breaking news on air travel - breakingnews.com
thread.title: Hewlett-Packard says 'we are working closely with United as they recover and work to restore regular flight operations,' says company does not manage system that causes network issues - @Reuters
thread.title_full: Hewlett-Packard says 'we are working closely with United as they recover and work to restore regular flight operations,' says company does not manage system that causes network issues - @Reuters

author: Rebecca Bratek
title: Hewlett-Packard says 'we are working closely with United as they recover and work to restore regular flight operations,' says company does not manage system that causes network issues - @Reuters
text: Jul 08, 2015, 04:05 PM GMT ( 16:05 ) Hewlett-Packard says 'we are working closely with United as they recover and work to restore regular flight operations,' says company does not manage system that causes network issues - @Reuters End of alert
